name: SpaceXYZ
description:
The result of two Scandinavian fools trying to become game developers.

Enjoy our little prototype-ish game, as you help Elon Muskular dodge asteroids while his Falcon 9 hurls towards endless space. Try to reach the highest score possible without crashing in to the debris. We'll buy cookies for the highest scoring player (we totally promise!)

Oh, and don't worry about Mr. Muskular, he's seen worse than a few asteroids.

Enjoy, Grillus & Fillipuster
